Text.Page:
Pangari is absolutely rightâ€”{@LinkCreature:5#19#Moong} is definitely the number one problem. We've got to eliminate him if we're going to get anywhere with the other tuwangis.

I only have a handful of soldiers here, though, and I need them right where they are.

I realize you've done a lot of work for this effort already, but if you could help just a bit longer, we'd be so grateful.

Oh, he's finally dead. This is great news. Maybe now the tuwangis will be able to pull their tribes back together once again!

Then maybe they'll be easier to convince when it comes to scaling back this troublesome swamp.
You haven't gone yet? Please, either go or tell me that you won't so I can find someone else. It must get done today.
